latest_revision.text: *'''Station Champions:''' Linda Brett, and Michelle Mueller *'''Communication:''' [https://groups.google.com/g/heatsynclabs/ Google Discussion Group] *'''Certification:''' Checkout for the Consew Industrial machine *'''Events:''' Sewing Night on the 2nd Tuesday each month from 7pm - 10pm '''''Generally'''...'' *Ask for help *Machines are delicate, act accordingly *Clean up after yourself *Stow machines after use '''''If you already know how to sew...''''' *Just use the basic sewing machines, serger, or embroidery machines after filling out a waiver. == Embroidery Machine == ===Husqvarna (Embroidery)=== [[File:Husqvarna_Designer_2.jpg|600px]] A sophisticated sewing machine better suited for '''''Intermediate''''' or '''Advanced''' users. Best use for it's '''''Embroidery''''' capabilities. [[File:Husqvarna Viking Designer II Users Guide.pdf | '''Husqvarna Viking Designer II User's Guide''', ''Manual'']] [[File:Husqvarna_Viking_Notes.txt | Husqvarna embroidery notes]] Video: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGJI4lVcFag '''Husqvarna Viking Designer II User's Guide''', ''YouTube'', Nov 20, 2019] Need: (Threading Instructions) (common mistakes) ("p" & "q") Need: (Embroidery Manuals and links) Need: (D-card upload procedure on Laser Windows XP machine) Need: (Inkscape and Ink/Stitch tutorial and video link) Bobbin Winding Instructions (2 methods) Bobbin: Husqvarna Embroidery Hoops Sizes *100 x 100 *150 x 240 == Sewing Machine == === Brother (Digital) === [[File:Brother_Project_Runway.jpg|600px]] '''Brother XR9550 Digital Sewing Machine ''"Project Runway Limited Edition"''''' Full-feature ''digital'' machine. Easy to use. Good for '''''Beginner''''' and '''''Intermediate''''' users. *60 built-in stitch patterns *foot-pedal or push-button control *automatic speed control *automatic needle threader *automatic back-stitch button *automatic button-hole feature '''Bobbin''': Brother SA156 (same as class 15J) [[File:Brother_XR9550_Sewing_Machine_Operation_Manual.pdf‎ | '''Brother XR9550 Sewing Machine Operation Manual''', ''Manual'']] [[File:Brother_XR9550_Sewing_Machine_Quick_Reference_Guide.pdf‎ | '''Brother XR9550 Sewing Machine Quick Reference Guide''', ''Manual'']] ---- === Singer (Heavy Duty)=== [[File:Singer_Heavy_Duty.jpg|600px]] '''Singer 4423 Heavy Duty Sewing Machine''' Basic feature ''manual'' machine. Good for ''''Beginner'''' and '''''Intermediate''''' users. *Heavy Duty (good for denim, etc) *22 built-in stitch patterns *button hole pattern [[File:Singer_4423_Heavy_Duty_Sewing_Machine_Instruction_Manual.pdf‎ | '''Singer 4423 Heavy Duty Sewing Machine Instruction Manual''', ''Manual'']] Bobbin: Class 15 specs, image, model, manual ---- === Bernina (Industrial) === Training Required! specs, image, model, manual ---- == Serger Machine == ===Baby Lock (Serger)=== specs, image, model, manual
